skillTree.localised_description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Among the enemy before the battle is even joined.
Only Loec’s chosen can disappear while in plain sight.
The Shadowdancers are the only Asrai who know all paths through Athel Loren.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God smiles as his followers outwit their opponents.

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
How can you prevail when you cannot trust your senses?

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Shoot her! SHOOT HER!
All Asrai respect and fear Loec’s ‘priests’.

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Loec has guided many actions from the shadows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
They know the ambush is coming, they just don’t know from where.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(own armies in region)

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Firing wildly into the darkness is hardly a winning strategy.
With a smile and a wink, the Shadowdancer subverts.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: +8%
	(enemy armies in province)

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Through some bargain or trick, Loec has directed Hoeth to protect his follower.

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Illusion is fragile but deal normal damage and can cast Whirling Death

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +2 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Atop a great pyramid in the highest heaven, Asuryan watches over the world alone and has never been seen by mortals.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Great Eagle and Hawk Rider units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whatever the motivation, legend tells that when Asuryan learned of Hoeth's actions, he rebuked the Lord of Wisdom, and in punishment, set much of Hoeth's great library ablaze.
As the goddess of nature, Isha taught the Elves how to care for the land and gain a plentiful harvest.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: By tradition, she is the only goddess to any longer walk the mortal world, and there are tales of her coming to the aid of those lost amidst the mists of Yvresse or upon the trackless ocean.
It is claimed that she reads the intention written in the heart of every elf and judges them not by their deeds, but by their hearts desire.
The Elf legends tell that Loec often saves the souls of the dead from Slaanesh by tricking the Dark Prince out of his prize.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Enslaved to Khaine's will, Vaul is forced to make weapons of extraordinary power for the War God's eternal battle against the great enemy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(all units in army)
